about_the_game:
ENJOY A NEW OPTIONAL AUGMENTED REALITY EXPERIENCE WITH THE TILT FIVE™ SYSTEM!




Chess Knights: Shinobi now supports Tilt Five™!

Level up your game night with tabletop holograms! The Tilt Five™ holographic gaming system transforms tabletop and video games into 3D vibrant holographic environments. Using the Tilt Five™ augmented reality (AR) glasses, Gameboard, and Wand controller, you can immerse yourself--and friends--in experiences like never before. Visit Tilt Five's website to find out how to bring Chess Knights: Shinobi alive on your tabletop!

With Tilt Five™, players will see the beautiful 3d art of Chess Knights: Shinobi coming to life in an incredible augmented reality experience!

name: Chess Knights: Shinobi - Tilt Five Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: You need Tilt Five™ glasses, Tilt Five™ wand, Tilt Five™ gameboard

short_description: Play Chess Knights: Shinobi in an incredible augmented reality experience using Tilt Five™ System!
